title: RIOT PLEASE KEY BINDING PROFILES FOR WHEN I GOTO A MATES PLACE
body: Hello my friends. At the moment I am playing league at a mates place on his whole set up. The main problem is that he doesn't want me to change any of his key bindings etc etc which is annoying because he is a level 23 noobcake and has the weirdest set up that has random keys all over the place.. It would be good if we could save our key binding profile because usually when i come over I don't have my keyboard and mouse in my back pocket. Cheers

replies.body: I also agree with this, or even just being able to save a few profiles on the 1 computer so for example me and my girlfriend both use my computer yet she uses standard keys i use different keys and mouse bindings for flash ignite etc would be simpler to just select use profile 1 then she uses profile 2 etc
We don't have the technology for that.
I actually would love to see this as well.
